name: Cipher Hunt Puzzle
description:
CONTROLS:

Puzzle Pieces:
Click and drag a piece to move it
Hold A to rotate the last clicked piece Left
Hold D to rotate the last clicked piece Right
Press Z to rotate the last clicked piece 90 degrees Left
Press X to rotate the last clicked piece 90 degrees Right

Camera:
Hold W to zoom in
Hold S to zoom out
Use the Arrow Keys to move the camera around

Saving only works in the downloadable version!

SAVING:
Press the CTRL on the LEFT side of your keyboard to save what you have.

As of right now it seems that saving, and then loading will mess with the pieces rotation so SAVE AND QUIT AT YOUR OWN RISK



Sorry this is so rough at this point. We threw this together in response to the pictures of the pieces being posted.
